verses.name: Acts 26:26
verses.text: For the king knoweth of these things, before whom also I speak freely: for I am persuaded that none of these things are hidden from him; for this thing was not done in a corner.

verses.name: Acts 26:27
verses.text: King Agrippa, believest thou the prophets? I know that thou believest.

verses.name: Acts 26:28
verses.text: Then Agrippa said unto Paul, Almost thou persuadest me to be a Christian.

verses.name: Acts 26:29
verses.text: And Paul said, I would to God, that not only thou, but also all that hear me this day, were both almost, and altogether such as I am, except these bonds.
